title: Superman Teaser Trailer: May The Force Be With David Corenswet - NDTV Movies
summary:

Publication Date: New Delhi

The highly anticipated teaser trailer for James Gunn's new Superman film has been released, introducing David Corenswet in the iconic role.

  • The teaser shows Superman in a snowy landscape, injured, with a notable quote: "Take me home" when Krypto the Superdog approaches him.
  • David Corenswet portrays both Superman and his alter ego, Clark Kent, who works for The Daily Planet.
  • Key characters introduced include Lois Lane, Lex Luthor, and Jimmy Olsen.
  • Other DC characters making appearances include Mister Terrific, Guy Gardner, Hawkgirl, and Metamorpho.
  • James Gunn emphasizes that the new Superman embodies humanity and kindness despite being an alien.
“The next Superman has to be someone who has all the humanity that Superman has but he's also an alien.” - James Gunn

This film marks David Corenswet's biggest Hollywood project to date, being the fourth actor to take on the Superman role.

title: Sohum Shah on Laapataa Ladies' exit from Academy Awards race: Oscar is not a parameter to tell how a film should be made - Hindustan Times
summary:
Sohum Shah opines on the matter of Laapataa Ladies not being shortlisted for Oscars 2025, and whether All We Imagine As Light would have been a better choice

Date: Dec 19, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Actor-filmmaker Sohum Shah discusses the exclusion of Laapataa Ladies from the Oscar race, emphasizing that winning an Oscar shouldn't dictate how films are made.

  • Laapataa Ladies, directed by Aamir Khan and Kiran Rao, was excluded from the Oscars 2025.
  • Sohum Shah believes Oscars do not define the quality of filmmaking.
  • He highlights the success of his film Tumbbad in its re-release, earning over ₹25 crores.
  • There was speculation that All We Imagine As Light would have been a better entry for the Oscars.
“Oscar is not a parameter to tell how a film should be made. It is not something to be so desperate and focused about.”

Shah concludes that the audience's reception of the film matters more than any awards.
newTitle: Sohum Shah on Laapataa Ladies' Oscars Exclusion

title: Mukesh Khanna Makes Controversial Comment On Ranbir Kapoor Playing Lord Ram: 'If You're A Chhichhora...' - News18
summary:
Mukesh Khanna Criticizes Ranbir Kapoor's Casting as Lord Ram

Date: December 19, 2024

Source: News18

Mukesh Khanna has raised eyebrows with his remarks concerning Ranbir Kapoor, who has been cast as Lord Ram in the upcoming film Ramayana. Khanna expressed concern that Kapoor's previous roles could affect how audiences perceive his portrayal of such a revered character.

  • Khanna hesitated to comment, fearing backlash, but affirmed that comparisons with Arun Govil are inevitable.
  • He stated that whoever plays Ram must embody the character in their real life as well.
  • Khanna highlighted that the public reception of actors like Prabhas should inform casting choices.
  • Ranbir Kapoor's role is significant for the Kapoor family, and he hopes Kapoor's recent negative portrayal in Animal won't overshadow his performance as Ram.
  • Details about other cast members include Sai Pallavi as Sita and potential casting for Hanuman.
“If you’re playing Ram, you’re not allowed to party and drink. But who am I to decide who plays Ram?” - Mukesh Khanna

The film is set to release in two parts, with the first part launching on Diwali 2026 and the second on Diwali 2027.
newTitle: Mukesh Khanna Criticizes Ranbir Kapoor's Casting as Lord Ram

title: EXCLUSIVE: Anil Thadanis Pushpa 2 locks horns with Baby John over screens; leaves exhibitors in a bind with advance booking halted - Bollywood Hungama
summary:
EXCLUSIVE: Anil Thadani’s Pushpa 2 locks horns with Baby John over screens; leaves exhibitors in a bind with advance booking halted

Publication Date: December 2023 Source: Bollywood Hungama

Pushpa 2 – The Rule continues to perform strongly but has faced issues with advance bookings due to a conflict between its distributor and that of Baby John, which releases on December 25.

  • Advance bookings for Pushpa 2 have been halted in many theaters for the coming weekend.
  • Anil Thadani, distributor of Pushpa 2, has mandated equal showings with Baby John for the holiday period.
  • The conflict is described as a tactical move by Thadani against PVR Inox Pictures, distributor of Baby John.
  • Theatres are waiting for a resolution to start bookings for Pushpa 2 while limited bookings have begun in some cinemas.
“If they don’t accept Thadani ji’s demands, theatres will not be able to play Pushpa 2 over this weekend.”

The ongoing conflict highlights the competitive nature of film releases during the holiday season, and both sides are working towards a compromise.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Faces Screening Battles with Baby John

summary:

Published: Thursday, December 19, 2024 at 10:35 AM

The latest TRP ratings have revealed notable changes in the rankings of popular television shows. While some have gained traction, others experienced minor dips. Here’s an in-depth analysis of this week’s TRP chart and the performance of audience-favourite series:

  1. Shiv Shakti Tap Tyaag Tandav: Maintains a TRP of 1.5 points.
  2. Parineeti: TRP dipped from 1.7 to 1.6 points.
  3. Mangal Lakshmi: TRP declines from 1.8 to 1.7 points.
  4. Taarak Mehta Ka Ooltah Chashmah: Jumped to 1.8 points from 1.7.
  5. Jhanak: TRP dropped from 1.9 to 1.8 points.
  6. Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Improved to 2.3 points from 2.2.
  7. Advocate Anjali Awasthi: Increased from 2.2 to 2.3 points.
  8. Anupamaa: Steady at 2.3 points.
  9. Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Climbed from 2.4 to 2.5 points.
  10. Udne Ki Aasha: Remains at 2.5 points, sustaining the top position.

title: Viduthalai 2’s duration reduced even before the release - 123telugu
summary:
Viduthalai 2’s Duration Reduced Before Release

Published on: Dec 19, 2024 Source: 123telugu

Vetrimaaran’s much-anticipated sequel, Viduthalai 2, has reduced its runtime from 172 minutes to 164 minutes, even before its release. The film stars Vijay Sethupathi and Manju Warrier.

  • The film received an A certificate from the censor board like its predecessor Viduthalai 1.
  • The initial runtime was set at 172 minutes, but it was trimmed by 8 minutes after the final output review.
  • Vetrimaaran praised the actors and technicians, emphasizing the learning experience throughout the project.
“It’s a long journey. I thank all the actors and technicians for their contributions. I can only talk about efforts and the public who should say how the film is.” - Vetrimaaran

This adjustment aims to enhance the film's pacing and audience engagement prior to its release.
newTitle: Viduthalai 2’s Duration Reduced Before Release

title: Singham Again Worldwide Box Office (Final): A Losing Affair In India, Rohit Shetty’s Biggest Record Remains Unshattered Despite Overseas Success! - Koimoi
summary:
Singham Again Worldwide Box Office (Final): A Losing Affair In India

Publication Date: December 2024
Source: Koimoi

Singham Again has officially wrapped up its theatrical run. There were humongous expectations for the film, which has concluded its box office journey on a losing note.

Key Points:

  • Domestic earnings reached 274.61 crores net.
  • Overseas earnings totaled 82.96 crores gross.
  • Worldwide box office grossed 406.99 crores.
  • Despite a large budget of 340 crores, the film has not met expectations.
  • It is Ajay Devgn’s second highest-grossing film.
“Singham Again is now the highest-grosser of Ajay Devgn globally, leaving behind previous records.”

The concluding figures reflect a failure to capture significant box office success against competitors like Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3, which outperformed with a lifetime total of 281.53 crores.
newTitle: Singham Again Box Office Results: A Disappointing Conclusion
